data.lyric:
[ti:Sit Next to Me]
[ar:Foster The People]
[al:Sacred Hearts Club]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sit Next to Me - Foster The People
[00:09.59]Written by：Mark Foster/Oliver Goldstein/Josh Abraham/Johnny Newman/Lars Stalfors
[00:19.19]And it's over it's over
[00:22.19]I'm circling these vultures
[00:24.37]Got me praying that it's longer
[00:27.38]Feeling something rotten
[00:29.55]
[00:30.19]Last time I saw you said what's up
[00:32.72]And pushed right through
[00:34.16]
[00:34.84]Then I tried to catch you
[00:36.74]But we're always on the move
[00:38.91]And now it's over we're sober
[00:42.23]Symptoms of the culture
[00:44.10]And the night ain't getting younger
[00:46.93]Last call's around the corner
[00:48.97]
[00:49.59]Feeling kinda tempted
[00:51.57]And I'm pouring out the truth
[00:54.34]Just fading out this talk is
[00:56.53]'Cause now all I want is you
[00:58.71]I'm saying come over here sit next to me
[01:02.17]
[01:04.20]We can see where things go naturally
[01:06.77]
[01:09.20]Just say the word and I'll part the sea
[01:12.06]
[01:14.06]Just come over here and sit next to me
[01:16.91]
[01:18.40]And I'll take you high high
[01:27.12]And I'll take you
[01:28.40]Well I ain't frontin' my intention
[01:31.10]Got your man outlined in chalk
[01:33.63]It's a midnight intervention
[01:36.07]Got no plans to make it stop
[01:38.55]
[01:39.48]Last time I saw you said
[01:41.39]You wanna keep the light
[01:43.43]
[01:44.12]But I'm here to tell you
[01:46.04]I'm not trying to change your mind
[01:48.19]It's alright ooh it's alright oooh
[01:56.97]
[01:58.25]Yeah come over here and sit next to me
[02:01.35]
[02:03.56]We can see where things go naturally
[02:06.41]
[02:08.57]Just say the word and I'll part the sea
[02:11.41]
[02:13.47]Just come over here and sit next to me
[02:16.22]
[02:17.73]And I'll take you high high high high
[02:37.64]It's alright
[02:39.32]
[02:42.56]It's alright
[02:45.11]
[02:47.51]It's alright
[02:49.77]
[02:52.50]It's alright
[02:54.95]
[02:57.98]So come over here and sit next to me
[03:00.90]
[03:02.96]We can see where things go naturally
[03:05.61]
[03:07.94]Just say the word and I'll part the sea
[03:10.69]
[03:12.90]Just come over here and sit next to me
[03:15.54]
[03:37.08]It's alright
data.trans:
[ti:Sit Next to Me]
[ar:Foster The People]
[al:Sacred Hearts Club]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.59]//
[00:19.19]完了 一切结束了
[00:22.19]我心中依然希冀着还有一线生机
[00:24.37]所以我不停祈祷 希望这份爱能延续下去
[00:27.38]感觉有些东西已经不似从前
[00:29.55]
[00:30.19]上次见你的时候 你问我 到底怎么了
[00:32.72]然后直接转身离去
[00:34.16]
[00:34.84]我试图将你挽回
[00:36.74]但是 我们总是只顾埋头前行
[00:38.91]如今 一切都结束了 我们都十分清醒
[00:42.23]是我们的性格太过迥异
[00:44.10]那浪漫的夜晚再也回不去
[00:46.93]我在街角最后一次拨通了你的电话
[00:48.97]
[00:49.59]感觉有些忐忑不安
[00:51.57]我慢慢向你吐露心声
[00:54.34]这次交谈就这样画上了句号
[00:56.53]因为 此刻 我只想拥有你
[00:58.71]我对你说 过来吧 坐在我身旁
[01:02.17]
[01:04.20]我们可以让一切顺其自然
[01:06.77]
[01:09.20]只要你说愿意 我会为你不顾一切
[01:12.06]
[01:14.06]过来吧 坐在我身旁
[01:16.91]
[01:18.40]我会带你奔向快乐天堂
[01:27.12]我会把你带在身旁
[01:28.40]好吧 我并非刻意这样说
[01:31.10]用粉笔描绘出你理想中爱人的样子吧
[01:33.63]就当作是午夜的消遣
[01:36.07]我还不想让这一切就此结束
[01:38.55]
[01:39.48]上次见到你的时候 你说
[01:41.39]你想一直保留着那份憧憬
[01:43.43]
[01:44.12]但是 我想告诉你
[01:46.04]我不是想试图改变你的心意
[01:48.19]放轻松 别紧张
[01:56.97]
[01:58.25]过来吧 坐在我身旁
[02:01.35]
[02:03.56]我们可以让一切顺其自然
[02:06.41]
[02:08.57]只要你说愿意 我会为你不顾一切
[02:11.41]
[02:13.47]过来吧 坐在我身旁
[02:16.22]
[02:17.73]我会带你奔向快乐天堂
[02:37.64]不要紧
[02:39.32]
[02:42.56]放轻松
[02:45.11]
[02:47.51]不要紧
[02:49.77]
[02:52.50]放轻松
[02:54.95]
[02:57.98]所以 过来吧 坐在我身旁
[03:00.90]
[03:02.96]我们可以让一切顺其自然
[03:05.61]
[03:07.94]只要你说愿意 我会为你不顾一切
[03:10.69]
[03:12.90]过来吧 坐在我身旁
[03:15.54]
[03:37.08]放轻松
